form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Risch (for himself, Mr. Cardin, Ms. Ayotte, and Mrs. Shaheen) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to provide for increased limitations on leverage for multiple licenses under common control.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Investment Capital Company Act of 2015.

section.header: Increased limitations on leverage for multiple licenses under common control
section.text: Section 303(b)(2) of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (15 U.S.C. 683(b)(2)(B)) is amended by striking $225,000,000 and inserting $350,000,000.
